name: Max Aerobic Climb #3
description:
With these max Aerobic efforts, we are looking to simulate climbing. This is achieved by riding with a lower cadence out of the saddle. 



During the intervals, ride out of the saddle as much as possible. It's ok to sit occasionally for 10-20 seconds if needed.
